channel.title: How do i change welcome message in 562?
channel.description: How do i change the welcome message of my 562 rsps? now it is something like "welcome to pkzevolutionscape, register at ww.pkzevolution.darkb.com, ...etc" how do i change this?plz don't just say "actionsender" or something!

item.title: How do i change welcome message in 562?
item.dc:creator: @j19283746 j19283746
item.description:
@j19283746 wrote:

Login your server. Read what it says at beggining. Go to your source. Then to your client. Hit Control + F. Type in what it said when you logged in. Then click find. Then change the text to whatever you want. Don’t forgot to compile and restart server after that.
P.S. Hope I helped

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change welcome message in 562?
